climbs.name: Year of the Spamb - Right Variation

content.description: Sit start in the cave matched on jug underclings.  Move out right to the good sidepull, and then up.
Sit start on good holds at the bottom of the cave, grab a bad left hand crimp on the arete and then a good edge to the right of the arete and exit straight up.
content.location: To the right of year of the lamb

content.description: Sit start in the cave, use right arete and left hand crimps to throw to the lip and then an easier mantle. A bit dabby, but that is part of the fun.

climbs.name: Year of the Lamb Cave Start

content.description: Start in back of cave as leap year and finish on YOTL. No kneepads!
content.protection: 2 regular pads and a super thin one

content.description: Start to the left of the undercling used on the cave start for YOTL matched on a left facing sidepull/pinch. Pull off the ground and move right to join the start of YOTL. Unique movement compared to the cave start, albeit a bit dabby. Fun to add moves into YOTL.  This start can also be climbed into gap year and year of the spamb.

This is a left cave start at the year of the lamb cave.  Use a left-facing sidepull/pinch to match hands just to the left of the undercling used for leap year. Pull on and move right into the start of gap year and finish as for that problem. Unique movement compared to the undercling start of GAP year. Can also be linked into year of the lamb and year of the spamb.  It is a little dabby, but an enjoyable problem.

For clarity:

The first move is RH to a nose-like undercling ( the same used in the direct cave version ) and the RH stops on the left facing jug rail before moving across your body into the start LH undercling of YOTL.  There are big holds up and left from the start, but the boulder at your back prevents suitable use, if someone moves this boulder it will open up new variations.  The big jug and undercling in the center of the cave are on and also used for leap year. The holds on the arete are

off

for this variation
content.protection: 2 pads and a small scratch pad for the start.

content.description: Start in back of cave good left hand and left foot cam rounded pinch for rh. Long move to good holds and then do Gap Year. Watch out for the dab on first moves.
content.protection: 2 regular pads and a super thin one

content.description: Sit start matched on jug in middle of face grab small sidepull, undercling crimps and throw to the lip.
content.location: Just left of year of the lamb
